parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ACD pump can cause the vehicle to lose traction and stability, leading to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: All three ACD lights come on
indicating a problem with the system.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The lockup of the front drive train can cause the vehicle to skid or lose control, leading to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The front drive train locks up
causing the vehicle to skid or veer off course.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the clutch can cause the vehicle to lose power or become difficult to shift, leading to accidents or strandings.
symptoms: The clutch pedal feels soft or spongy
the clutch pedal sticks to the floor
the clutch pedal does not return to its normal position
the clutch pedal has a delayed return to its normal position
the clutch pedal has a sudden loss of pressure
the vehicle is unable to shift into gear.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The corrosion of the lower control arm can cause stability and control problems, leading to unsafe operation at any speed, which can result in accidents.
symptoms: Loose or disconnected lower control arm
deep rust and irregular hole visible on the subframe socket.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Loose front bearings can cause erratic steering, premature tire wear, and premature brake wear, leading to loss of control and accidents.
symptoms: Erratic steering
premature tire wear
premature brake wear.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering system can cause loss of control, leading to accidents and injuries.
symptoms: Uncontrollable steering wheel
wheel locking
inability to turn the car.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Water Ingress and Electrical System Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Water entering the vehicle through the grommet in the driver-side wheel well can cause corrosion of wires and connectors, leading to electrical system failures, including malfunctioning lights, engine, and airbag systems, which can increase the risk of accidents and compromise vehicle safety.
symptoms: Lights will not turn off
engine will not turn off even after keys are removed and battery is disconnected
SRS airbag light comes on
wipers won't stop running
horn starts on its own
and airbag system malfunction.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the airbag system due to water ingress and electrical system corrosion can lead to a failure of the airbags to deploy in the event of an accident, increasing the risk of injury or fatality.
symptoms: SRS airbag light comes on
airbag system malfunction.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Corrosion and Rusting of Subframe and Front Lower Control Arm
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The corrosion and rusting of the subframe and front lower control arm can cause the vehicle to become unstable, pull to one side, and experience severe oversteering, increasing the risk of accidents and loss of control.
symptoms: The vehicle becomes unstable
pulls to one side
experiences severe oversteering when turning
and may have uneven tire wear.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Delayed Recall Repair and Parts Unavailability
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The delayed recall repair and unavailability of parts can leave vehicles with safety-critical defects on the road, increasing the risk of accidents and injuries.
symptoms: Vehicle owners receive recall notifications but are unable to have the repairs done due to parts unavailability
leading to frustration and concern about vehicle safety.
